(Simplified: 镞)
Chinese Definition:
①箭頭：箭鏃。
②形容箭的鋒利輕捷：“所爲貴鏃矢者，爲其應聲而至”。

鏃字的基本解释

鏃
zú

鏃
chuò
均见“镞”。

鏃字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zú］
［《廣韻》作木切，入屋，精。］
亦作“鉃2”。“镞1”的繁体字。
(1)箭头。
(2)借指箭。
(3)轻捷锋利。参见“鏃矢”。
(4)雕刻。参见“鏃鏤”。
(5)通“簇”。参见“鏃鏃”。
[②]［chuò］
［《集韻》測角切，入覺，初。］
“镞2”的繁体字。
一种小型锄。亦指一种锄法。

鏃字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鏃； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1319第03
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?作木切，音?。【說文】利也。【玉篇】箭鏃也。【書·禹貢·礪砥砮丹傳】砮石中矢鏃。【釋文】鏃，子木反。【賈誼·過秦論】秦無亡矢遺鏃之費。【集韻】或作鉃。　又【集韻】【正韻】?千木切，音蔟。又【集韻】側角切，音捉。又千?切，音湊。義?同。　又【集韻】昨木切，音族。與銼同。　又【集韻】測角切，音娕。鋤也。諺曰：欲得穀，馬耳鏃。賈思勰說：或作鋜。

arrowhead
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zú］
["Guangyun" makes wooden cuts, enters the house, and is refined. ]
Also known as "鉃2". "镞1" in traditional characters.
(1) Arrow.
(2) By means of arrows.
(3) Light, agile and sharp. See "Yi Shi".
(4) Carving. See "Spindle".
(5) Through "cluster". See "Arrow".
[②]［chuò］
["Jiyun" angle measurement cut, enter the sense, the beginning. ]
"镞2" in traditional characters.
A small hoe. Also refers to a hoe method.
arrowhead
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Xu Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　镞; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 1319 Page 03
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Make wood cut, sound?. [Said Wen] Lee also. [Jade articles] Arrow arrow also. 【Book·Yugong·Lipi Dan Biography】The arrow in the stone. 【Explanation】Yin, Zi Mu Fan. [Jia Yi·Guo Qin Theory] Qin Wu's death arrow is the cost of his legacy. 【Ji Yun】or as Zhuo.　[Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun]? Thousands of wood cuts, sound Kun. Also 【Jiyun】Cut the side angle and catch the sound. Thousands of cuts again, Yin Min. Righteous? Same.　[Jiyun] Yesterday Muqie, phonology. Same as file.　[Jiyun] Angle measurement and cut, sound. Hoe too. The proverb says: Desire to get the valley, horse ears. Jia Sixie said: Or behave.
